data.description:
A place to shitpost gun memes.

**Alright dumbasses, learn to use direct links to images. Imgur works fine and is stupid simple to use and there are other hosts that also work. Any posts that are simple images that don't open in a preview may or may not get yeeted depending on how bored I am or how obnoxious the host it.** 

Take it back to the glory days of old, shitty memes, guns with hats, doggos with gats, meth and tendies. 

If it's not a humerous shitpost take it somewhere else, there's plenty of other guilds so have at it. This isn't meant to be the home of any movement and it's not a place to vent, rant or post anything that you actually take seriously. 

Have at it you retards.

For more related content, check out the [Firearms Guild Network!](https://ruqq.us/2y6a)

data.description:
A free-speech haven to post dank christian memes away from crazy mods and Reddit drama.

ALL Christian memes are welcome! 

Rules:

1) **Memes must be about Christianity:** Off-topic posts will be kicked

2) **Don't be a Moron:** May result in a 3 minute temp-ban and the red hammer of *shame*, plus we will make fun of you.
   
3) **No Heresy/Blasphemy:** This is the only thing you can get perma-banned.


Related guilds: +veggietales_memes

data.description:
Weird and interesting YouTube (or other platform) videos with less than 100,000 views. 

Looking for high-quality non-political Guilds? See +GuildsOfSubstance, a growing list of worthwhile Ruqqus non-political Guilds.

Rules: 

Videos must be older than 6 months. 

No self-promotion. 

Do not post reuploads of videos with equal to, or greater than 100,000 views.

Do not post mainstream content that has not been transformed or modified in a meaningful way.

No bots allowed

data.description:
Laughing at the absurdity of society one post at a time. All political sides of the spectrum are welcome. Welcome to PoliticalHumor.
_____

#### Rules

_____

###### POSTS MUST BE BOTH DIRECTLY POLITICAL AND HUMOROUS

Funny content that is NOT political belong here:

* +Memes
* +DankMemes
* +DarkHumorAndMemes (NSFW)

Political posts that are NOT humorous belong here:

* +News
* +OpposingViewpoints
* +Politics
* +World_Politics

If you are looking for ONLY political memes, go here:

* +PoliticalMemes

_____

###### MARK NSFW FOR

* Antisemitism
* Racism

_____

###### NO HARASSMENT OR THREATS OF VIOLENCE

* Do not harass your fellow users.
* Do not threaten with violence or plan to execute unlawful violent activity and do not encourage others to do so.

_____

###### NO SPAM

* Do not flood this guild with rule-breaking or off-topic content.

_____

###### If you encounter rule-breaking content, report and downvote it. For a more accurate rule guide, see the pinned Guide to Posting.
data.description_html:
Laughing at the absurdity of society one post at a time. All political sides of the spectrum are welcome. Welcome to PoliticalHumor.

Rules

POSTS MUST BE BOTH DIRECTLY POLITICAL AND HUMOROUS

Funny content that is NOT political belong here:

  • +Memes
  • +DankMemes
  • +DarkHumorAndMemes (NSFW)

Political posts that are NOT humorous belong here:

  • +News
  • +OpposingViewpoints
  • +Politics
  • +World_Politics

If you are looking for ONLY political memes, go here:

  • +PoliticalMemes
MARK NSFW FOR
  • Antisemitism
  • Racism
NO HARASSMENT OR THREATS OF VIOLENCE
  • Do not harass your fellow users.
  • Do not threaten with violence or plan to execute unlawful violent activity and do not encourage others to do so.
NO SPAM
  • Do not flood this guild with rule-breaking or off-topic content.
If you encounter rule-breaking content, report and downvote it. For a more accurate rule guide, see the pinned Guide to Posting.

data.description:
A fact-based news guild to expose when technology companies overstep their boundaries, violate our privacy, and engage in manipulative and deceptive behavior.

**Rules**

**1\.** Posts must be mainly about something "bad" that a technology or tech company has done, will do, or is currently doing (the company doesn't have to be big).

**2\.** No posts based on speculation. Content and headlines cannot be either false, unverifiable, outdated, and/or misleading. 

**3\.** No political articles. This is not a political guild. Articles that focus on a government entity or politician(s) will be kicked.  

**4\.** No spam, self-promotion, crossposts, or posting content similar to what's already been posted here.

**5\.** Post URLs should link to a text-based source‚Äînot an audio file, image, or video.
data.description_html:
A fact-based news guild to expose when technology companies overstep their boundaries, violate our privacy, and engage in manipulative and deceptive behavior.

Rules

1. Posts must be mainly about something "bad" that a technology or tech company has done, will do, or is currently doing (the company doesn't have to be big).

2. No posts based on speculation. Content and headlines cannot be either false, unverifiable, outdated, and/or misleading.

3. No political articles. This is not a political guild. Articles that focus on a government entity or politician(s) will be kicked.

4. No spam, self-promotion, crossposts, or posting content similar to what's already been posted here.

5. Post URLs should link to a text-based source‚Äînot an audio file, image, or video.
